title: 6 months of being on OCE boards, AMA
body:
It seems like everyone on the boards seems to know each other quite well except me. So, I set up this AMA to sort of open up and allow others to know me better.

Ask me Anything

replies.body:
Hi, 

I wanted to know what you write about on the boards (what is your main focus), and what are you hoping to achieve by spending time doing this?

I for instance:-
read about current issues in league, (to keep up to date with them)
write about the OPL, (evolved from watching, and trying to help build the spectator base in the Oceanic region)
try to promote my Digital Puppet Masters Tournaments. (To build a following and attract more participants).
I don't really have a main focus so i must be a shit poster :)

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5EELH5Ui,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-04-08T02:45:46.114+0000)
>
> I don't really have a main focus so i must be a shit poster :)

lmao that doesn't make you a shit poster.
Shitposter OR shit poster? There's a difference.
tits or ass
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/538/731/0fc.gif
No one seems to understand me at all, I mean practically everything I give my opinion on gets downvoted, and let me repeat that word, OPINION.

and its the opinion of someone else that they think what you're saying is bad, so they downvote.

hold on wait a second... its like... that makes sense?

But these people are getting offended for no reason, again its just my opinion so people are entitled to disagree, but they respond with such a violent attitude like I'm some criminal. We're just here to talk and discuss our opinions on certain topics and it seems like everyday someone wants to start a war. It just seems unreasonable that almost every single comment I have made usually is at the bottom of the comment thread and becomes unnoticed. It makes me out for some random troll when I'm really here to give my opinion and insight on things.

People get sued for sexual harassment after performing mouth to mouth on drowning people, by the person whose life they saved.
So I wouldn't expect people in this world to be too rational, if I were you. :P

In this cushy PC world we live in, most people have never experienced any kind of hardship at all, and so when there is something that makes them feel uncomfortable (like an opinion), they have nothing bad to compare it to and so blow it up into a big deal in their minds and make it into world war 3. 

People like you and me think "I don't like that opinion and ill argue against it, but it wont keep me up at night, because there are so many worse things that I am glad I don't have to deal with, like cholera, or war."

But a lot of people don't think like that, they focus too hard on the little inconveniences in front of them, and try to make them big issues, because they just don't know what a real issue is.

So I wouldn't worry about it, theres that saying "You can be whatever you want to on the internet, why do so many people choose to be idiots." Be thankful that you can count yourself not among the idiots :P

to many 

https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000798110293/8d92e00d365bdaf85352fd2f141290b9_200x200.jpeg

I know you kinda well, but still wanna join in xD
Generic questions incoming!

1. What is your favourite game mode? (excluding normal 5v5 games)

2. What do you think the best skin in the game is? (and why)

3. If you could remove 1 champ from the game, who would it be?

1. 3v3s, fast, intense, snowbally

2. The best skin, in my opinion, has to be Blood Moon Talon (yes, I'm biased). The recall captured Talon's character perfectly, for me and the animations look dope 

3. I would definitely remove Shaco from the game. I just hate how he just.....Plans everything and tilts me so hard

https://i.giphy.com/pxrZyntTbMz9S.gif

The correct answer is all of them.
Maccas or hj's
Burgers are better at Hungry Jack's
respect

What do you want to do after high school?

Why do you enjoy talon and gangplank?

Whats one thing you wish League of Legends had?

1. I intend to finish high school and study software engineering as I love video games a lot

2. I enjoy Talon simply for the fact that I can burst down a squishy and get away most of the time Scot free. I love Gangplank because of all the
 barrel combos and the unexpected critical damages

3. I don't really know what I'd want league to have, I'm happy with it's current state :)

Why would you say that about Talon, it was a rito trick to find our what they need to nerf more.

Graves or Lee. Only one true to themselves can answer this question.
Graves
Who are u?  Tell me about yourself.

I'm Shyam Bhat. I currently study in Year 10 and started playing league as a way to connect further with my friends. I play casually and don't take the game too seriously.

Family from India, currently in India until the 5th of May 

I main Talon and GP currently
Sexy
Teemo or Yasuo. Only one true to themselves can answer this question.
Yasuo
You answered wrong.
feelsbadman
Riven or Fiora. Only one true to themselves can answer this question.
*sigh* Fiora
Nami or Lulu? :D
Nami
Ebon Hawk or Millennium Falcon?
Millennium Falcon
